amendment.description: To save student financial aid and reduce the student loan debt levels in the Republican budget by 15 percent by eliminating new mandated interest charged while students are still in school.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 953 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 953 proposed by Senator Merkley. (consideration: CR S1880-1881; text: CR S1880-1881) To save student financial aid and reduce the student loan debt levels in the Republican budget by 15 percent by eliminating new mandated interest charged while students are still in school.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 953 proposed by Senator Merkley.
